traits.name: Acidic Attacks
entries: If a creature takes acid damage from the miasmorne and that creature is wearing nonmagical metal armor, that armor is destroyed.

traits.name: Acidic Hide
entries: After a nonmagical metal weapon hits the miasmorne that weapon melts and is destroyed. Likewise, nonmagical metal ammunition that hits the miasmorne is destroyed.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The miasmorne makes three attacks using Bite, Flechette or a combination of the two.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) acid damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape DC 18). The miasmorne can't make Bite attacks while a creature is {@condition grappled} in this way.

actions.name: Flechette
entries: Ranged atk +11 to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6 damage) acid damage.

actions.name: Flechette Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The miasmorne launches flechettes from its fins in a 90-foot cone in front of it. All creatures in the cone must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6 damage) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Acidic Secretion (1/Day)
entries: The miasmorne secretes an acidic solution, then sprays it around itself. All creatures in a 20-foot-radius sphere, centered on the miasmorne, must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw. Targets take 26 (4d12 damage) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. All nonmagical metals within the radius that aren't being carried, as well as nonmagical metal items carried or worn by creatures that failed the save, are destroyed.
